string.name: parse_error
string.comment: Title parsing error for Youtube etc

resources.string: タイトルを解析できませんでした
1日のScrobble件数の上限を超えました

string.name: required_fields_empty
string.comment: Shown on filling a form

string.name: top_artists
string.comment: Top artists the user has listened to

resources.string: アルバムアーティスト
似ているアーティスト

string.name: top_albums
string.comment: top albums the user has listened to, or most scrobbled albums of an artist

string.name: top_tracks
string.comment: top tracks the user has listened to, or most scrobbled tracks of an artist

resources.string: 似ているトラックはありません

string.name: similar
string.comment: Similar tracks but in short

string.name: artist_title
string.comment: $artist — $title

string.name: tap_to_edit_force
string.comment: Edit the scrobble or force submit the scrobble

string.name: recents
string.comment: Short for recently scrobbled

string.name: first_scrobbled_on
string.comment: %1= date

string.name: auto
string.comment: automatic or default setting

string.name: almost_there
string.comment: Shown on the first screen after install, asking the user to complete the setup

resources.string: 動画ストリーミングアプリ

string.name: other_apps
string.comment: Apps which are not music players or video streaming apps

resources.string: 現在オフラインです。表示中のデータは最新ではありません

string.name: scrobble_services
string.comment: Services like lastfm, librefm, listenbrainz etc

string.name: recents_share
string.comment: %1= artist — track, %2= relative time (with preposition e.g. on Sep 9)

string.name: recents_share_username
string.comment: %1= artist — track, %2= relative time (with preposition e.g. on Sep 9), %3= username

string.name: charts_share
string.comment: %1= time period (e.g. 3 months, monthly), %2= top artists/albums/tracks, %3= list of artists/albums/tracks

string.name: charts_share_username
string.comment: %1= time period (e.g. 3 months, monthly), %2= top artists/albums/tracks, %3= list of artists/albums/tracks, %4= username

string.name: num_scrobbles_nav
string.comment: n scrobbles (total) • n (scrobbles) today

string.name: num_scrobbles_since
string.comment: %1= number, %2= date of joining lastfm

resources.string: 通知へのアクセスの許可
音楽のメタデータを取得するために必要です。音楽以外の通知は読み取りません

string.name: authenticate_with_lastfm
string.comment: Login with last.fm

resources.string: LibreFM、GNUFM、Listenbrainzの認証は後ほど設定から行えます
マイクへのアクセス権限を許可してください

string.name: charts
string.comment: User\'s top artists, albums, tracks and line chart of daily scrobble counts

string.name: from_mic
string.comment: (Scrobble from mic in short, ideally 10 characters or less)

resources.string: 録音に失敗しました。このデバイスでは、マイクが使用中か使用できない可能性があります

string.name: possession
string.comment: %1= name (e.g. Reimu's)

string.name: user_scrobbles
string.comment: %1= username

string.name: not_found
string.comment: Shown in search

resources.string: 見つかりませんでした

string.name: appwidget_period
string.comment: 1 week, 1 month, 1 year etc

resources.string: ウィジェットは15分ごとに更新されます
ホーム画面ウィジェット - チャート
連続してScrobbleする場合は、Shazamを代わりに開き、Auto Shazamをオンにしてください。また、ShazamがScrobbleの対象アプリになっていることを確認してください。
